Version 2.1.37 - Activation Flow, Webhook Events, Token Expiry, Service User

New Features

  • Company activation/deactivation via SmartLearning API with activation codes
  • Webhook event system: batched dispatch of token, user, and company events to SmartLearning
  • Dedicated smartlearning_service user with scoped role for API callbacks
  • Superadmin user provisioning during company activation
  • Token expiry based on contract end date instead of default validity days
  • Duplicate token cleanup on re-activation (prevents token accumulation)
  • Delete users API: single and batch soft-delete with token revocation
  • Toggle company access and toggle access API functions
  • Company access status endpoint for SmartLearning queries
  • Activity log page with event type filtering and company scoping
  • Dispatch webhooks scheduled task for reliable event delivery

Improvements

  • Context-aware validation for company-scoped tokens (category context instead of system)
  • Actor user ID tracking for webhook events and user metadata
  • Manager type support during user creation (company manager role assignment)
  • System-level role assignment for created users (webservice/rest:use capability)
  • Plugin release version sent during activation

Previous Versions

  • v2.1.31: Document ID fields (DNI/NIE/Passport), token watcher API
  • v2.1.30: User creation APIs, batch creation, watcher endpoint, RSA encryption
